body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY! 

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
Error message at https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/cmd/kubeadm/app/phases/addons/dns/dns.go#L206 is "unable to decode CoreDNS configmap %v", err"

**What you expected to happen**:
IMHO Error message should be "unable to decode CoreDNS serviceaccount %v", err" in same file and line number as We are decoding serviceaccount for CoreDNS and not configMap. configMap is already done in line 176 in same file.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Check https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/cmd/kubeadm/app/phases/addons/dns/dns.go#L206

**Anything else we need to know?**:
I just found it while working on some other PR. I didn't install kubernetes/kubeadm.

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`):
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release): Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS (Xenial Xerus)
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
Linux ubuntu 4.10.0-42-generic #46~16.04.1-Ubuntu SMP Mon Dec 4 15:57:59 UTC 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

- Install tools:
- Others:

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Indicates an issue or PR lacks a `sig/foo` label and requires one.
labels.name: needs-sig

title: Wrong error message for CoreDNS addon in kubeadm addons
